### âœ… Verifying Your Download

**Why verify?** Checksums ensure your download wasn't corrupted or tampered with.

#### Windows (PowerShell)
```powershell
Get-FileHash spider-solitaire-{VERSION}-windows-amd64.exe -Algorithm SHA256
```
Compare the output with the checksum in `checksums.txt`.

#### Linux
```bash
sha256sum -c checksums.txt
```
Should output: `spider-solitaire-{VERSION}-linux-amd64: OK`

**Windows Users:** You may see a "Windows protected your PC" warning because this software is not code-signed. This is expected for open-source software. Click "More info" â†’ "Run anyway" to proceed.

The checksums above prove the file hasn't been tampered with since release.
